keyFacts: The invoice is dated November 1, 2004, and is addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Total charges for the invoice amount to $265.87.
Multiple shipments were made by Jeffrey E. Epstein in October 2004, with various recipients.
The invoice includes details of discounts applied to the shipping charges.
Several recipients of shipments include Richard Branson, Jean Huguen, and Dante Ferretti.
